Description: Fragment of a limestone stela; incised Coptic text.
Curator's comments: Cf. 1919,0505.29 (BM. 1876) and 1919,0505.19 (BM. 1866), which both name perhaps the same Victor, who may be the dedicator of these stelae.
Bibliographic references: Crum & Bell 1922 / Wadi Sarga: Coptic and Greek texts (p.68)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.Sarga 44 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
